1.10.2.1.4.10: Patch 1.4.10 adds few nice misc. features (model block and OBJ loading without JSON model) which generally should improve UX a bit and simplify decorating set with Blockbuster models/Metamorph morphs, and lay down a foundation for future new features (which involves removing old useless code).
1.10.2.1.5: Blockbuster 1.5 is a massive update which improves almost every aspect of the mod. Main features of 1.5 are: improved support for OBJ, revamped GUIs, improved damage control and green screen features.
